title: Buying Beater Lots T Series Lots
author: rednecksims

posts.post_title: Buying Beater Lots T Series Lots
posts.post_content:
Looking for all T series.  Not looking for graded, highend, or rare backs.  People are asking me for T series cards more as a vintage novelty to put on display as an old card than to collect them.  

I would possibly buy extremely low grade (prefer no major paper loss on front and altered but authentic) stars with common backs.

Thanks
David
